COMM_ABILITY_ACCESS: ̄Confirming access to the Monolith... preparing to upgrade the Reactor with the %ls ability...
COMM_ABILITY_DESC_RULER: ̄Zoom is a special ability, enabling you to warp between any two Zoom Stones you've previously attuned with. ā When you see a Zoom Stone along your journey, simply seek it out and attune with it to add it to your Zoom list.
COMM_ABILITY_DESC_FULLTANK: ̄Full Charge is a special ability that will quickly restore your monster team to full health. ā If you have multiple injured allies, use this ability to conveniently heal up before moving on.
COMM_ABILITY_DESC_RANARUTA: ̄Tick-Tock is a special ability that grants its user with the ability to change day into night, or vice versa. ā In case you weren't aware, some monsters may only appear during certain times of the day. ā When you're searching an area for a specific monster, and you aren't finding it, try changing the time using this ability.
COMM_ABILITY_DESC_RANARION: ̄Forecast allows its user to control the current state of the weather. ā Different monsters avoid different types of weather. Use this if you aren't finding a monster you want to scout.
SKY_RETURN_MSG_10: ̄Flying Monster Ride has not been set. ā

COMM_ABILITY_DESC_MAKE_UP: ̄Makeover is a special skill that lets us change appearances on the go. ā Use it whenever you are looking to just change things up a little bit.
